collection.name: Dingle-dangle
collection.openText: Let's all become a fruits. Let's hang together. Your despair, sadness...Let's all dangle down.

specialTipSize.specialTip: Dingle-dangle attempts to hypnotize an Agent with over 3 Prudence every 40 seconds. However, if any of their other three stats are also over 3, they were unaffected.

Employees hypnotized by Dingle-dangle entered the Containment Unit in a trance. (This phenomenon has been dubbed “Allurement”.) When the employee was killed, a "fruit" appeared in the Containment Chamber.
Dingle-dangle's 'fruit's produce PE-Boxes. Additional 'fruit' mean a greater number of produced PE-Boxes.
